fields.name: Food Drive
fields.description: Start a food drive for a local shelter.

fields.name: Compliment Day
fields.description: Give genuine compliments to five people.

fields.name: Book Sharing
fields.description: Set up a community book exchange.

fields.name: Help an Elder
fields.description: Assist an elderly neighbor with groceries.

fields.name: Park Cleanup
fields.description: Organize a cleanup day at a local park.

fields.name: Book Donation
fields.description: Donate books to a local library or school.

fields.name: Volunteer Tutoring
fields.description: Offer free tutoring sessions for students in need.

fields.name: Senior Social
fields.description: Host a social event for seniors in your community.

fields.name: Pet Fostering
fields.description: Foster a pet until it finds a forever home.

fields.name: Clothing Swap
fields.description: Organize a clothing swap to promote sustainable fashion.

fields.name: Bike Repair Workshop
fields.description: Offer a free bike repair workshop in your community.

fields.name: Neighborhood Watch
fields.description: Start or participate in a neighborhood watch program.

fields.name: Free Hugs Campaign
fields.description: Start a free hugs campaign to spread positivity.

fields.name: Tree Planting
fields.description: Organize a tree planting day to help the environment.
